articles.description: Premier League reaction as Brighton come from 2-0 down to beat Spurs, while Man Utd draw with Villa and Chelsea held by Forest.

articles.description: Celtic defender Greg Taylor will miss Scotland's Nations League matches against Croatia and Portugal this month, and goalkeeper Angus Gunn is a fitness doubt.

articles.description: Tottenham manager Ange Postecoglou calls his side's collapse against Brighton in the Premier League "probably the worst defeat since I've been here".
articles.title: Brighton 3-2 Tottenham: Boss Ange Postecoglou unhappy with 'worst' Spurs defeat

articles.description: NBA great LeBron James, 39, has played alongside son Bronny, 20, for the first time in a game with the Los Angeles Lakers.
articles.title: LeBron James and Bronny James make NBA father and son history with Los Angeles Lakers

articles.description: England produced a clinical attacking display in a nine-try win over New Zealand to move closer to retaining their WXV1 title in Canada.
articles.title: New Zealand 31-49 England: Clinical Red Roses hammer New Zealand at WXV
